name: sandbox
//scripts: NPM scripts for running development, testing, and build commands

scripts.//start: Starts the development server with hot-reloading at http://localhost:3000
scripts.//build: Creates an optimized production build in the build/ directory
scripts.//test: Runs tests in interactive watch mode, re-running tests on file changes
scripts.//eject: Ejects the create-react-app configuration for full customization (irreversible)

//eslintConfig: Configuration for ESLint to enforce code quality and consistency

eslintConfig.//extends: Uses the predefined rule sets for React and Jest testing

//browserslist: Defines which browsers should be supported in production and development

browserslist.//production: Browser targets for the production build, balancing compatibility and performance
browserslist.//development: Browser targets for development, focusing on modern browsers for faster builds
